description: Metadata fields required for Tier Descriptive 1 level microscopy files
title: Microscopy Settings Tier D1

___ch00_light_source_model.description: Manufacturer and model number of the light source on channel 0
___ch00_light_source_model.title: Ch00 light source model

___image_t_step.description: the time step between images, e.g. 2 sec, 100 millisec
___image_t_step.title: Image time step

___ch01_light_source_model.description: Manufacturer and model number of the light source on channel 1
___ch01_light_source_model.title: Ch01 light source model

___ch00_light_source_type.title: Ch00 light source type

___ch04_light_source_center_wl.description: Center wavelength of the light source on ch03
___ch04_light_source_center_wl.title: Ch04 center wavelength

___ch02_light_source_center_wl.title: Ch02 center wavelength

___ch00_light_source_center_wl.title: Ch00 center wavelength

___ch04_light_source_model.description: Manufacturer and model number of the light source on channel 3
___ch04_light_source_model.title: Ch04 light source model

___image_pixel_size.description: the dimensions of pixels in the image
___image_pixel_size.title: Image pixel size (µm)

___ch03_light_source_type.description: Type of the light source for channel 3
___ch03_light_source_type.title: Ch03 light source type

___ch03_light_source_model.description: Manufacturer and model number of the light source on channel 3
___ch03_light_source_model.title: Ch03 light source model

___ch02_light_source_model.description: Manufacturer and model number of the light source on channel 2
___ch02_light_source_model.title: Ch02 light source model

___image_channel_encoding.title: Image channel encoding

___ch01_light_source_type.description: Type of the light source for channel 1
___ch01_light_source_type.title: Ch01 light source type

___microscope_model.description: Manufacturer and model of the instrument used for imaging
___microscope_model.title: Microscope model

___ch04_light_source_type.description: Type of the light source for channel 3
___ch04_light_source_type.title: Ch04 light source type

___ch03_light_source_center_wl.description: Center wavelength of the light source on ch03
___ch03_light_source_center_wl.title: Ch03 center wavelength

___objective_model.description: Manufacturer and model of the microscope objective
___objective_model.title: Objective model

___ch01_light_source_center_wl.title: Ch01 center wavelength

___ch02_light_source_type.title: Ch02 light source type

___microscope_effective_magnification.title: Microscope magnification (X)
